title.rendered: Accentuate to Serve IRS’s Multiyear Contract with IBM Global Services

content.rendered: Accentuate Technology Inc. will work with The Affordable Care Act (ACA) on their IRS contract. The Affordable Care Act (ACA) Coverage Data Repository (CDR) project creates a data repository to serve as the backbone for other ACA projects. This contract was awarded to IBM Global Business Services under Contract No: TIR-NO-11-D-00022 TO 0002 (2011-2016) and TIR-NO-11-D-00022-0013 (2017-2018).  Our responsibility will include, acting as the operational database for ACA projects; storing data from ACA projects; and making data available to IRS systems, Health and Human Services (HHS), and other external organizations.
